name: Puzzle Break
description:
Hey! This is a 30 days relaxing routine, take a cup of coffee/tea or whatever and enjoy some relaxing picross and takuzu.

CONTROLS

PICROSS : Left click to destroy "empty cells". Right click to mark "filled cells".

TAKUZU : Left click to insert a "1". Right click to insert a "0".

If you don't want to wait for the puzzles to unlock each day, type "ocarina" on the main screen.
